name: Transcendent (Hael the Okay)
description:
Transcendent is about the journey of a young woman turned restless spirit named Maven. Maven won't rest until she can resolve her feelings about Sean, her now ex-fiance who struggles with moving on. In this otherworldly text adventure, you will play as Maven and decide what she will do next.

Music involved is not my own and was found through the freemusicarchive.org. The songs were made by artists Chad Crouch, Mystery Mammal, and Porno Galactica.
